name: Mr. Mower (the demo)
description:
CONTROLS:

  • Accelerate: W, enter, or Up arrow
  • Break/Reverse: S, shift, or Down arrow
  • Move Left: A or Left arrow
  • Move Right: D or Right arrow
  • Advance Dialog: W, enter, or Up arrow
  • Navigate Menu: W or Up arrow
  • Select Menu Option: Enter

Welcome to the demo for Mr. Mower, a funny little lawnmowing game.

Follow Hane as she puts Mr. Mower to the test in fun and challenging levels.

Gonna try my best to make this as good I can get it before releasing the full game commercially. Feedback is appreciated as always.

Play on Newgrounds too: Mr. Mower (the demo) (newgrounds.com)

Music by (1) Noah Hughes (@cashwarior1) / Twitter

Thanks for playing : )
